results.name: Start scan
results.description: Scan started

results.name: Missing HTTP header - Referrer-Policy
results.description: Checks for Referrer-Policy header

results.name: HttpOnly flag of cookie
results.description: Checks if cookies have HttpOnly flag

results.name: Missing HTTP header - Content-Security-Policy and Security.txt
results.description: Checks for Content-Security-Policy header and .well-known/security.txt file

results.name: Detect email addresses on page
results.description: Detects email addresses in page content, mailto links, and source

results.name: Detect mixed content (HTTP inside HTTPS)
results.description: Detects HTTP resources loaded in HTTPS pages

results.name: Detect website technologies
results.description: Detects technologies used by the website

results.name: check_08_cve_server_software.py
results.description: no such group

results.name: Client access policies
results.description: Checks for crossdomain.xml and clientaccesspolicy.xml

results.name: Check if robots.txt exists
results.description: Checks for robots.txt file and reports its presence/content

results.name: Check if .well-known/security.txt exists
results.description: Checks for .well-known/security.txt file and reports its presence/content

results.name: Check for untrusted SSL certificates
results.description: Checks for SSL certificate trust issues

results.name: Check if HTTP TRACE/DEBUG methods are enabled
results.description: Checks for TRACE/DEBUG HTTP methods

results.name: Check if OPTIONS method is enabled
results.description: Checks for OPTIONS HTTP method and reports Allow header

results.name: Enforce HTTPS-only
results.description: Checks if HTTP redirects to HTTPS

results.name: Detect directory listing
results.description: Detects if directory listing is enabled

results.name: Detect unencrypted password forms
results.description: Detects password forms not using HTTPS

results.name: Detect error messages in responses
results.description: Detects error messages in HTTP responses

results.name: Detect debug messages
results.description: Detects debug messages in HTML/JS

results.name: Detect HTML code comments
results.description: Detects HTML comments in page source

results.name: Missing HTTP header - Strict-Transport-Security
results.description: Checks for HSTS header

results.name: Missing HTTP header - X-Content-Type-Options
results.description: Checks for X-Content-Type-Options header

results.name: Missing HTTP header - Feature/Permissions-Policy
results.description: Checks for Permissions-Policy or Feature-Policy header

results.name: Detect passwords in URL query string
results.description: Detects password values in URL

results.name: Cookie domain too loosely scoped
results.description: Checks if cookie domain is too broad (e.g., .example.com)

results.name: Detect cross-domain JavaScript inclusions
results.description: Detects JS loaded from other domains

results.name: Internal error code in response
results.description: Checks for 5xx error codes

results.name: Missing Secure flag on cookie
results.description: Checks if cookies have Secure flag

results.name: Detect login interfaces
results.description: Detects login forms or endpoints

results.name: Verify secure password submission
results.description: Checks if password forms submit over HTTPS

results.name: Detect sensitive data in HTML
results.description: Detects SSNs, card numbers in HTML

results.name: Detect unsafe Content-Security-Policy config
results.description: Checks for unsafe CSP settings

results.name: Detect exposed OpenAPI or Swagger files
results.description: Checks for openapi.json or swagger.json

results.name: Detect file upload fields
results.description: Detects file upload forms

results.name: Test for SQLi via parameter injection
results.description: No query parameters to test for SQLi

results.name: Detect password values in later response
results.description: Detects password values in HTTP response

results.name: Path disclosure in error messages
results.description: Detects file path disclosure in errors

results.name: Session token in URL
results.description: Detects session tokens in URL query or fragment

results.name: Discovery of exposed API endpoints
results.description: Detects exposed API endpoints (e.g., /api, /v1, /graphql)
